originalText.text: The ladies in the front were quick to assist me and get me situated. I even called because I was a little lost and they quickly provided directions! Then I met with Maha (Very lovely lady!) who explained all the steps and what is to be expected for my appointment. She also helped make recommendations for some issues I expressed.  I‚Äôm looking forward to returning and being a consistent patient here.

originalText.text:
I've been going to Tribeca MedSpa for laser hair removal and the experience has been nothing short of fantastic! Merve is a skilled professional and has worked with plenty of transfeminine folks before, putting me at ease in the chair. I very much appreciate the blend of warmth and pragmatism that she's brought to each session -- she managed my early uncertainties with clear expectations and goals and over the past twenty months has gotten me to exactly where I've wanted to be. Thank you so much!

- K

originalText.text: Alex Lovin is amazing - she has consistently been amazing from the moment I met her at my consultation over a year ago and continues to be amazing and supportive through my laser hair removal and skincare journey. She kindly and compassionately addresses all of my skin concerns and questions and gives me the most well rounded and practical advice based on her diverse expertise. I‚Äôm grateful that she accommodates all of my last minute schedule changes and works with me to improve my skin and hair. My skin and hair have never looked better since I‚Äôve started seeing her and I am beyond grateful as someone who struggles with PCOS and hormonal acne with stubborn hormonal hair growth. I highly recommend her to anyone in the Tribeca area looking for a well rounded esthetician üëèüèª

originalText.text:
I've been a loyal client of Malika at Tribeca Medspa for the past three years, and I can't help but share my exceptional experience.

Malika's service is nothing short of amazing. Her facials leave me feeling incredibly fresh, and my skin is consistently glowing when I leave her skilled hands. Malika is undoubtedly a master of her craft, and her expertise shines through in every session.

What sets Malika apart is not just her professional prowess but also her genuine and warm personality. Beyond being a skincare expert, she is a truly amazing person.

If you're seeking top-notch skincare coupled with a wonderful experience, Malika at Tribeca Medspa is the one to trust.

originalText.text:
I recently had the MiraDry treatment at Tribeca MedSpa and I am absolutely thrilled with the results! The experience was exceptional, and the staff went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable throughout the entire process.

Since the MiraDry treatment, I have noticed a significant reduction in sweating in the treated area. The results exceeded my expectations, and I couldn't be happier with the outcome. The professionalism and expertise of the staff at Tribeca MedSpa truly set them apart. No more aluminum based antiperspirant for me!
